definition: to exchange/to change (clothes etc)/to substitute/to switch/to convert (currency)

sentences.english: In other words, be tactful, but don’t be afraid to give your honest opinion.
sentences.chinese: 换言之，要机智，但是别怕发表你真实的意见。

sentences.english: In other words, learning spontaneously is one of man's unique traits.
sentences.chinese: 换言之，自动自发的学习是人类的独特性质之一。

sentences.english: In other words, Mussina wishes the team could have that seventh inning back.
sentences.chinese: 换言之，老穆希望洋基能够时光倒流到那个第七局。

sentences.english: In other words, go small and learn.
sentences.chinese: 换言之，去小处着手，边干边学。

sentences.english: In other words, to maintain self, to face the reality, not greedy for profit.
sentences.chinese: 换言之，要保持自我，面对现实，不可贪财图利。

sentences.english: In other words, parent yourself vicariously through parenting your own children.
sentences.chinese: 换言之，通过养育自己的孩子达到补偿自己的目的。

sentences.english: In other words, in this tradition religion came first.
sentences.chinese: 换言之，解释的传统是从宗教开始的。

sentences.english: In other words, he harms more people than he helps.
sentences.chinese: 换言之，他伤害的人比他帮助的人多。

sentences.english: In other words their children have a 25% probability of becoming Squibs .
sentences.chinese: 换言之他们的孩子有25%的可能性成为哑炮。

sentences.english: In other words, the fineness of the influence of the test results is what?
sentences.chinese: 换言之，影响细度检测结果的主要因素是什么呢？

sentences.english: In other words, they saw the potent6ial in the teacher.
sentences.chinese: 换言之，学生看到老师身上的潜力。

sentences.english: In other words, these two disputing regulations would be better abolished as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 换言之，这两项争议的规定，宁及早废止为宜。

sentences.english: In other words, resources and policies are inter-dependent.
sentences.chinese: 换言之，资源和政策是相互依赖的。

sentences.english: Reason six is, in other words, "country" is also a machine.
sentences.chinese: 来因六是，换言之，“国家”同时也是一台机器。

sentences.english: In other words, the total performance is tied to the performance of the slowest database partition.
sentences.chinese: 换言之，整体的性能受制于最慢的数据库分区的性能。

sentences.english: That means each person on average wastes about half-a-kilogram a day.
sentences.chinese: 换言之，每人每天平均制造半公斤厨馀。

definition: in a nutshell/to put it briefly
in fact/in reality/as a matter of fact/in practice
in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
in simple terms/to put things simply/briefly
only if (..., or otherwise, ...)/only when/only in the case that/unless
from this, it can be seen that...
